Title: Kobol's Last Gleaming (2)
Plot: When Commander Adama learns that Kara disobeyed orders and Jumped to Caprica on orders from President Roslin, he demands the president's resignation, with the implied threat of a military coup. Roslin refuses his demand and sparks a confrontation.
GuestStars: Jim Shield, Alonso Oyarzun, Warren Christie, Nicki Clyne, Jennifer Halley, Leah Cairns
